definition: can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: The hydroxyapatite-coated prosthesis helped to reduce stress difference at bone and prosthesis interface.
sentences.chinese: 羥磷灰石表面塗層假體能緩和界面層的應力差異。

sentences.english: He needs some time to play and come back to full fitness.
sentences.chinese: 他需要一些時間，通過打比賽來恢復他滿格體能。

sentences.english: There's no real advantage in terms of physicality or weaponry.
sentences.chinese: 不需要體能或者武器上的優勢。

sentences.english: Exercise is defined as a sub- set of physical activity.
sentences.chinese: 練習被定義爲體能活動的子組。

sentences.english: Track and field sprint is a typical speed of the physical class-based project.
sentences.chinese: 田徑短跑運動是典型的體能類速度型項目。

sentences.english: Good police physical ability is one of the necessary conditions for the policemen in public security work.
sentences.chinese: 良好的警察體能是公安民警從事公安工作的必備條件。

sentences.english: It seems that sustain division is within the limits of the protoplasts of small size only.
sentences.chinese: 似乎只有體積小的原生質體能保持持續分裂。

sentences.english: Benayoun and Squillaci are completely fit. Squillaci lacks match fitness, Benayoun does not.
sentences.chinese: 斯奎拉齊缺乏比賽體能，貝納永不缺乏。

sentences.english: The benefits of physical activity are solidly-proven and well documented.
sentences.chinese: 體能活動的好處是牢固驗證和有據可查的。

sentences.english: Labour efficiency - Workers become physically more dexterous.
You’re using your body at a higher level than you would throughout your day.
sentences.chinese: 您將體能發揮到一個比一天中的其他時間更高的水平。

sentences.english: Yogi Berra:Baseball is ninety percent mental. The other half is physical.
sentences.chinese: 棒球有百分之九十是心理戰，另外一半是靠體能。

sentences.english: Anyone can go hiking, but rock climbing really separates the men from the boys.
sentences.chinese: 誰都能去徒步旅行，但是攀巖才能真正考驗人的體能。

sentences.english: The partially separation of benzoin and dansyl-amino acids were also achieved.
sentences.chinese: 對安息香和氨基酸衍生物對映異構體能部分分離。

sentences.english: The bowman is dependent for real efficiency on his bodily strength much more than the arquebusier.
sentences.chinese: 與火繩槍手相比，弓箭手依賴的是自身體能。

sentences.english: Within the physical powers of self-moving and can be divided into two explicit.
sentences.chinese: 自我權力體能可分爲內動的和外顯的兩種。

definition: to toughen/to temper/to engage in physical exercise/to work out/(fig.) to develop one's skills/to train oneself
to practice/to train/to drill/to perfect (one's skill)/exercise/(literary) white silk/to boil and scour raw silk
to surpass others/outstanding/(basketball, soccer etc) to get past an opponent
